Class DamageCalc

  • java.lang.Object
    • DamageCalc

  • public class DamageCalc
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the damage calculator algorithm class.

    • Method Detail

      • attackDamage

        public void attackDamage(int attackType,
                double multi)
        Calculates the damage that a certain attack will do with respect to which weapon the player is using. Each weapon will administer a different amount of damage.
        Parameters:
        attackType - This is the type of attack the player chooses. 1 - Basic, 2 - Strong 3 - Special.
        multi - This is the power multiplier of the weapon

      • evasionChance

        public void evasionChance(int evasion)
        Calculates the chance an enemy will evade and attack.
        Parameters:
        evasion - int value of the enemy evasion.

      • totalDamage

        public int totalDamage()
